verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Praise ye the Father! for His loving kindness, Tenderly cares He for His erring children; Praise Him, ye angels, praise Him in the heavens, Praise ye Jehovah!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Praise ye the Savior! great is His compassion, Graciously cares He for His chosen people; Young men and maidens, ye old men and children, Praise ye the Savior!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Praise ye the Spirit, Comforter of Israel, Sent of the Father and the Son to bless us; Praise ye the Father, Son, and Holy Spirit, Praise ye the Triune God! Amen.
